post.body: : Found you through Twitter Grader (http://twitter.grader.com). Looking forward to following you.
I am sending tweets on Palm. Goes to everyone - not to the person intended. I bet everyone knew my intention b4 I said anything?
That tweet was not intended for u. Wait. I guess it was cuz u got it. :-D
Ur energy comes thro ur tweets. Love to you.
Today has been a day for lining up our team to make conscious accountability household words. How cool will that be?
Synchronity-Oprah tonite says w/flow-life is easy.Phone rings-Garrett Gunderson, author,"Killing Sacred Cows". Do I want to work w/him?
2008-9 life changing events-3 in SanDiego,1 in Vancouver,1 in NJ,2 in Orlando & CEOSpace-Lake Tahoe. Ready to take my clients to new level!
Morning. Time for the stillness and to feel creation. Ready for the gifts in this day.
Played Piano Wizard for hr. I haven't played piano since 2nd grade when teacher was older than dirt-wouldn't let me have fun. Tonite- FUN!
Posted Christmas pictures on Facebook. Carter, our Grandson, was obviously the VIP of the day!
I've never played piano. Learned to play piano in 10 minutes with our new Piano Wizard. Seriously! If you want to know more, ask me.
Merry Christmas! We have gifts 4 munchkins. We will leave them at mom's next week. Love u lots.
Off to do some last minute shopping. Time to relax and enjoy the day!
Formulating and forming collaborative efforts w partners and brainstorming branding strategy. Re-creation is fun! A new recipe to success!!
Grateful for ALL the amazing and wonderful people who have touched my life this year. Yep!! That includes amazing and wonderful YOU!
It feels like Christmas!!...I am rediscovering it thro the eyes of a two year old again...excitement,amazement,fun,happiness,secrets,joy...
Son, daughter-in-law, grandson here. 2 yr old grandson has grown in ht and gotten smarter in 2 1/2 wks since we last saw him. He's so fun!
Feeling pull to write. Other things seem to take precedence. Perfection in distractions-perfection in wanting to write. Trust in what is.
Extended family party tonight! Gabrielle, Kaplan, Karen & Will helped get ready for it. It was a party b4 the party! Merry Christmas!
I'M BACK!! AMAZING 10 days @ Lake Tahoe for CEOSpace! Witness & participant in incredible model of collaboration & cooperation! INSPIRED!
